nodes.text: The Saruwen Station system was a star system located within the Tamarin sector in the Outer Rim Territories region of the galaxy. Aside from the Saruwen Station, the solar system contained a distant purple sun, a ringed yellow gas giant, and a distant nebula which could be observed from the space station.

Ace Azzameen piloting the Sabra, Emon Azzameen piloting the Andrasta, and Aeron Azzameen piloting the Otana, provided cover for Tomaas Azzameen and Galin Azzameen as they piloted the transport Vasudra through this system twice on their way to and from an ambush involving a shipment of Bacta for the Rebel Alliance.

The purple sun in this solar system, in-universe, is not noted as unusual. However a purple sun observed in real-world nature would be considered an anomaly in the disciplines of astronomy and astrophysics.[source?]
